author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'absolute' update Trailer for Goddess of Victory: Nikke, a third-person action RPG developed by Shift Up. Upon finishing the Tactical Upgrade Plan and returning from the Crystal Region, the Absolute squad receives a new mission. An unknown Rapture appears before Eunhwa, who's exhausted from recurring nightmares. The absolute update is available now for for iOS, Android, and PC.

#ign #gaming
title: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Official 'We Are Absolute' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Tribe DLC reveal trailer from Drop Duchy where players will take command of the new Tribe faction, which introduces new exclusive building types inspired by real-life stone monuments such as Stonehenge. Align with the rhythms of nature and the stars above, drawing from the celestial magic of the Constellations mechanic to awaken new mystical abilities. Witness the ancient power of stone with The Tribe faction as they shape the battlefield with nature’s might. The Tribe DLC releases August 18 on PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Drop Duchy - Official The Tribe DLC Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet Mara, a melee DPS assassin who uses stealth to get up close and personal to land surprising and devasting attacks.
Fellowship is a multiplayer online dungeon adventure (MODA) developed by Arc Games. Players will use strategy, team cooperation, and skill to overcome the plethora of dungeons Fellowship has to offer. Defeat bosses, collect loot, and work together to overcome ever-present challenges. Fellowship is launching in 2025 for PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Fellowship - Official 'Meet Mara' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the endless demo update for Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation, a hand-drawn, over-the-top FPS romp that blends the soul of a Saturday morning cartoon and the body count of a B-movie bloodbath. As Captain Wayne you will reclaim your stolen ship by using a variety of weapons on the mercenary gang that wronged you. Developed by Ciaran Games LLC and published by Silver Lining Interactive, Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation Demo is live on Steam now!

#ign #gaming
title: Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation - Official Endless Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Day one back in the suit! Take a look at Day One on Set Featurette for Spider-Man: Brand New Day, the next cinematic installment of the MCU. Get a look at day one on set for Spider-Man: Brand New Day starring Tom Holland, Zendaya, Jacob Batalon, Jon Bernthal (as The Punisher), Sadie Sink, Mark Ruffalo (Hulk), and more. Spider-Man: Brand New Day opens in theaters on July 31, 2026.

#ign #spidermanbrandnewday
title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day - Official ‘Day One on Set’ Featurette (2026) Tom Holland, Zendaya

author: IGN
description:
Watch a Warhammer 40,000 expert react to your 40K and Space Marine questions! 

How would you explain Warhammer lore to someone who knows almost nothing about it? Well, we got Arbitor Ian, a Warhammer 40,000 master, to answer a mix of IGN audience and Reddit questions. From the 40kLore to Tau40K subreddit, and more, Ian explains why Orks are a threat to the galaxy, if there's a 40K version of the internet, how genestealer cults work, and more!

Arbitor Ian is a Warhammer content creator with a focus on introducing 40K lore to newcomers and veterans alike.

You can watch his videos here: https://www.youtube.com/@UCHOFy9rDa1Zsvb39hYBBVpA
Or, check out Arbitor Ian's Instagram page here: https://www.instagram.com/arbitorian

00:00 - Intro
00:43 - Is There A 40k Version Of The Internet?
02:03 - Differences Between A Navigator And A Psyker?
03:19 - Would An Astartes Ever Side With An Alien?
04:33 - Is The Omnissiah A Blatant Heresy?
07:01 - What Was The Second Founding?
09:12 - What’s Up Sp
title: Warhammer 40,000 Expert Answers Your Questions
